      • writeXmlOutput

        public static void writeXmlOutput(List<TestResults> allResults,
                  Writer writer)
                           throws IOException
        Writes the test results in XML format to the supplied writer. This method does NOT close the writer object.
        Parameters:
        allResults - The test results.
        writer - The writer in which the XML data will be written to.
        Throws:
        IOException
